results.title: Seconds Sale - Leather Keyring UK, Leather Keychain, Key Ring, Leather Key Chain, Leather Key Holder, Leather Key Fob, Leather Keyring Strap
results.description:
**REDUCED CAPACITY**
Due to the Covid-19 pandemic and the third lock-down here in the UK, we are reluctantly having to reduce our capacity. We will be shipping orders once weekly on Mondays (last orders Sunday midday GMT). We are so sorry for any disappointment. Stay safe everyone, Zoe and David x

----------
Seconds Sale – Light brown leather keyring embossed with 'Live. Laugh. Love'. Other colours and phrases available (see below). This item is a slight second in that the metal keyring loop is slightly tarnished, see photos, but does not effect use and will still make a wonderful gift complete with gift box. 

Available with the following colours and messaging:

• Black – Dad's taxi
• Dark brown – Adventure awaits
• Light brown –  Live. Laugh. Love.
• Turquoise blue –  Home sweet home

--------------------
SPECIFICATION
• Dimensions – Width 3.8cm x height 6.5cm / width 1.5" x height 2.6" inches  (excluding metal ring) 
• Embossed metallic gold foil 
• Leather  – Beautiful 100% genuine cowhide leather
• Includes gift box
• Optional gift wrapping available

results.title: Live Laugh Law Unisex Light T-Shirt
results.description:
A comfy shirt for all, express the joys of Life, Laughter, and the Justice of the Law :) 

This t-shirt is everything you've dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch. It's comfortable and flattering for both men and women. 

• 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (Heather colors contain polyester)
• Ash color is 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester
• Heather colors are 52% combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester
• Athletic and Black Heather are 90% combed and ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester
• Heather Prism colors are 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester
• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz (142 g/m2)
• Pre-shrunk fabric
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
• Side-seamed

results.title: LIVE, Every Moment LAUGH, Every Day LOVE, Beyond Words Wall Decal Home Decor Inspirational Quote Perfect for the Bedroom Living Room kitchen
results.description:
LIVE, Every Moment LAUGH, Every Day LOVE, Beyond Words Wall Decal Home Decor Inspirational Quote Perfect for the Bedroom Living Room kitchen

The decal is floating letters/picture stuck to whatever you stick it to, the background will be whatever the color of the object you stick it to. 


TO INSTALL 
- Clean the surface, Glass, car, laptop
- Peel the paper back, carefully and slowly, making sure the decal sticks to the transfer tape. If the decal come off with the backing, backup a little rub the decal and begin to peel again. 
- Place the decal on the surface and smooth out the bubbles
- Peel the transfer tape, making sure the decal sticks to the surface

results.title: Live Love Laugh: Personalized Birthday Gift, Anniversary Gift, 3D Personalized Art
results.description:
Very sweet daily reminder to live, love, and laugh!

Personalize this beautiful handmade piece with your favorite colors and patterns.

Show your sense of style and originality with this one of a kind piece. This makes a wonderful gift for friends or family.

Created using acid-free card stock, non-toxic ink, and glass and wood shadowbox frame. 

When ordering, please add a note choosing one or more colors for the hearts using the fourth image options. Please note that I have many different colors than those listed- just ask! Black, white, gold, and silver frames are available!

In notes, please list the names, dates, or other text that you would like to be included as well as the font using the fifth image options.

**Please allow two weeks for your order as each picture is made with love and by hand :).**

results.title: Live Laugh Love Burlap Wooden Sign
results.description:
This is a cute wooden sign with some sweet quoted burlap. It says Live Laugh Love. It is a little recycle piece that I had from my wedding runners. Great runners and a great positive sign for your home. I used white acrylic paint for the wood. 

The thickness of the wood is 3/4 inch. The ball jar is used as a reference for its height. It is about 5 1/2 inches high. 

Please email me with any questions regarding details. 
- Mary

results.title: Live A Little Love A Lot SVG, cutting file, Cricut and Silhouette, jpg, png, Live A Little, Life Quote, Bless The FOod, Love Grows Best
results.description:
Live A Little Love A Lot SVG - commercial & print on demand (POD) use digital vector design files in SVG, DXF, EPS, PNG, JPG and PDF format.

Rustic Sign SVG, vector cutting file, Home Sign SVG, Love Grows Best SVG, SVG designs, Inspirational SVG, Home SVG, Home Quote SVG, Live A Little SVG, Bless The FOod SVG, Rustic Quote SVG, Life Quote SVG, Live Laugh Love SVG

😻  Make Your Own Bundle  😻
https://www.etsy.com/listing/867564061/make-your-own-svg-bundle-custom-diy

__________________________________________________________________
❤️  Included in this Listing ❤️

One zip file containing the following formats:
• 1 SVG
• 1 DXF
• 1 EPS
• 1 PNG (6000 x 4500 pixels)
• 1 JPG (6000 x 4500 pixels)
• 1 PDF

The design is organized into two sepereate folders named as 'layered' & 'flattened'.

a) The 'layered' folder has all the elements grouped together but NOT welded to allow for further modifiactions by the buyer.
Note: All the individual letters of the words are welded but the words and other design elements are free for modification.

b) The 'flattened' folder contains welded version of the design where all the elements are welded together for quick and easy cutting.

__________________________________________________________________
❤️  License information ❤️

This listing includes unlimited personal commercial & print on demand (POD) use license.

🚨 The license does NOT permit any form of sharing, reselling or redistribution of the original or modified design. 🚨

__________________________________________________________________
❤️  How to get the files ❤️

• You will receive an email after purchase with a link to download.
• Goto https://www.etsy.com/your/purchases

For more information visit https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-gb/articles/115013328108

__________________________________________________________________
✋  READ CAREFULLY BEFORE BUYING ✋

• PLEASE CHECK YOUR MACHINE'S & SOFTWARE'S ABILITY TO USE THESE FORMATS.

• Please make sure you can open/extract zip files.

• This file will be available to you immediately after purchase.

• Props (mockups) shown in the listing images, such as shirts, sign, mug, frames, etc., are not included.

• I DON'T OFFER REFUNDS FOR DIGITAL DOWNLOADS.

__________________________________________________________________

Feel free to get in touch if you have any questions!
You can also email me at -> care@7svg.co

Thanks for shopping!

All the designs and items are original copyright-protected work of 7svg.co

♥ ♥ ♥

results.title: Bless This Nest  Wall Vinyl Decal - Living Room Vinyl Wall Decal - Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

* Can be purchased with or without hearts as shown in picture 2. If you would like the hearts included, in the notes to seller box at checkout, please include with hearts. If no note is added, you will be sent just the saying without hearts as shown in picture 1. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. If you don’t see the size you need, please message us to see if we can set up a custom order. 

-	Decals apply to smooth, flat surfaces
-	Decals do not have a background and are one solid color
-	Decals are not reusable
-       If you want to be sure that the vinyl will stick to the surface and want to test it before purchasing a full decal, you can order a sample for $2.00 (this includes shipping the sample).

*Please see our FAQ section below prior to purchasing! 

♥ Please review OUR Shop Policies and Procedures prior to purchasing and feel free to message me with any  questions. Thank you for visiting Riley K Designs! ♥

results.title: Passport Boarding Pass Cellphpne Wallet Check Book Dollar Bills Zipper Pocket French Quote Live Laugh Love
results.description:
Enjoy traveling? Yes? We all know the hassle of going through security check points, showing all of our travel documents, taking them in and out of carryon bag, putting them back in your bag, remove them again at another point....... Chances are when you dig into your bag and try to find them yet it can be difficult because when you are in a rush or being surrounded by many frustrated travelers, you might not be able to concentrate, and forgot which compartment you put them in, or,  some of your precious items were inadvertently falling out your bag without your notice and got lost!!! What a terrible thing if that happens :-(. Trust me, I had been working at the busiest airport in the world - Atlanta International Airport, I saw this happening EVERY SINGLE DAY! So, I decided to make this wallet to help me, help you, help all of those who love to travel! Here is what you need to do: before you head out for the airport, put your boarding pass, passport, drivers license, even your cellphone and a couple of credit cards in this wallet, all in one place! Put the rest of your stuff such as makeup kit inside your bag separate from your travel documents, they can stay there until you pass security check point, find your departure gate, sit down and enjoy some nice food and beautiful airport scenes, and relax! This wallet will conveniently keep all your travel documents in one place and organized. What a relieve!  I am using it myself and loving it! It relieved my frustration! Now, I can put all my travel documents in ONE PLACE! 

Get it NOW, it maks traveling much easier and enjoyable :-) !


This wallet features a vintage Paris Hat on Stand image, and a quote "Live Laugh Love" in French.

Your wallet has:

~~~~~~ 6 card slots; 

~~~~~~ 2 big pockets for your check book, coupons, boarding pass, passport or your cellphone; 

~~~~~~ 1 zipper pockets for your valuable items; 

~~~~~~ You can put almost everything you need in ONE purse;

~~~~~~ Velcro closure, avoided metal, magnetic; protect magnetic strip on your card from damage!

~~~~~~ In addition, a D ring is added to the top center of the wallet for your convenience to attach a wrist strap. If you need a wrist strap please convo me, I will make one for you! 

~~~~~~ Care instruction: spot clean only.

~~~~~~ It is made with cotton fabric, stabilized with many layers of interfacing, soft to touch, stand alone and holds its shape. 

~~~~~~ Size: 8 1/2" x 5" x 1". 

~~~~~~ This wallet is made by me at a smoke and pet free home studio.

The exquisite wallet has enough pockets to keep your cards, coupons, cash, check book, and etc. organized. You will not need to search your bag, looking for small things that could sometimes drive you crazy. LOL.

I present the top quality handmade items to my customers. 100% quality guaranteed! You will love it! 

This purse is ready to ship.

Make sure to check out my other evening bag and clutches http://www.NingsSilkWorld.Etsy.com

Any questions please feel free to send me a message.

Thank you for stopping by!

Lisa
